item.title: scooze - Building Better Tooling for Magic: the Gathering
item.description: Since last summer, I have been working with some friends to create better tools for developers working with Magic: the Gathering data. Card and deck data has historically been unapproachable for independent projects because of the amount of setup required just to represent these game objects. scooze aims to fix that! from scooze import Card, Deck, Color card = Card("Python", colors=[Color.Black]) deck = Deck(archetype="My Deck", cards={card: 2}) deck.add_card(card, 2) We also support developing with scooze using Docker.

item.title: Pioneer RCQ Win
